1. The screen will display a photo which captured by your webcam

2. If the photo contain your correct sitting posture, please press the ok button
Welcome to sitwell. sitwell is a sitting posture correct app that will provide a 9-weeks course to correct your sitting habit.

Requirement for this training:

A place to lie down Lie on one side, keeping your lower leg slightly bent on the ground.

Engage your core by drawing your belly button in toward your spine.

Raise your top leg without moving the rest of your body. Hold for 2 seconds at the top. Repeat 10 times.
SitWell is a sitting posture correct app that will provide a 9-weeks course to correct your sitting habit.
There is mainly composed of three important components: correction, relaxation and training.
It can help you to build the habit of adapting a good sitting posture. It will connect to your computer camera and notify you when you are in a unhealthy sitting posture.

Studies show that one of the main reason of having a bad sitting posture is due to poor muscle conditions. It will guide you to do some relaxation/training of muscles through your phone\'s camera and voice and improve your sitting posture.
